resources.string: You need to select a text to operate
Fast, excellent experience, never lost content

Nice to meet you!
This is a quick plain text editor, we hope that writing can return to the original: Pure, safe, at any time, do not lose the content, super reliable.
Pure Writer achieves the perfect line spacing and paragraph spacing on the Android platform, and it makes your text look more comfortable and clear. At the same time, it also achieves a smooth scrolling, swiping down to close the soft keyboard, and many pleasing details.
Simplicity is hidden complexity. You can interrupt or continue writing anytime, anywhere, and can quickly encrypt your text with fingerprints. In addition, it can easily and quickly send the text to other Apps. We have all done this for you.
The most important, When using this editor, it will ensure that your content will never be lost. Even if you mistakenly delete the text, or instantly power off, you will still be able to recover it from history. 
Once you have finished writing an article, you can use the Send button to send it to other Apps, or you can open a new article.
Now you can try to clear this page and carry out your creation. The Clear button is in the menus. If misuse, you can also recover it from the history. We regard your creation as the most important treasure.
Please enjoy it.
Destroyed this article successfully, and you could revert it from history page
Need fingerprint unlock to view and edit
No more, and we only save %d histories
Permission fetch failed and will not be able to save the record
We need permission to automatically back up your articles, in order to prevent your articles from being lost, please grant permission.
We need permission to automatically back up your articles, please go to the settings page to manually grant the permission, otherwise, the history function can not be used normally!
Failed to unlock the fingerprint, the remaining number of retries: %d
Failed to unlock the fingerprint, please try again after 1 minute, the program is about to exit ...
The title supports up to 100 characters

Pure Writer is committed to creating a pure and good plain text writing experience, so it is not intended to support rich text content. At this time, you may see the text in the presentation with bold text , boldface is hidden, no open, because bold can not be expressed in the TXT file, sorry, please forgive me! If you have a better suggestion, please join the feedback group to tell me, thank you for your support!
Note: The segmentation indentation setting item will not change the existing text
If this setting is Yes, when copying or sending text, it will automatically insert a blank line after each line of the text, because there is no good spacing in other Apps.
Temporarily can not set this. Coming soon.
Please move the cursor position in the content to set the placement of the cursor after inserting the article
Click OK to delete this shortcut

Pure Writer 3.0 - Never Lost Content Editor
https://medium.com/@drakeet/pure-writer-3-0-never-lost-content-editor-419fc75a6f9d

纯纯写作 3.0 - 愿文字带我们穿越时光，连接过去，遥想未来
https://sspai.com/post/43650
Your text is too long to be sent directly to another Apps. It has already copied the text to your clipboard

If you think Pure Writer is great, and hope that it can be better, are you willing to spend a little money as an incentive for the developer?

This enables us to stick to good direction, create conscience products, and inspire more independent developers.

You can click the "GOOGLE PLAY" button to open Google Pay Payment. As a return, Pure Writer will provide ad-free state and all Pro contents for you. Thank you very much!
Need to buy Pure Writer Pro
A new Pure Writer %1$s is available
Do you want to delete this article and its related history?
Purchased. If the status is not refreshed, try clicking the Pro item again and will NOT deduct your money again.
Found that you opened an external file, please select an action
File saved failed, please copy your full text, and then restart the App to see if the content is missing
The backup file will be saved to the path /sdcard/backups/PureWriterBackup.db
The backup file will be read from the path /sdcard/backups/PureWriterBackup.db

"Pure Writer's history files are only in the /sdcard/PureWriter directory. If you're about to use your backup files to restore content. The original PureWriter directory will be renamed to PureWriter.old, and then we will create a new PureWriter directory with the backup files. \n\nThe following is all the backup files, click to restore the backup: "
The backup file does not exist. Please put the backup file in /sdcard/backups/PureWriterBackup.db and try again
Tip: Long press it on the home page can hide it temporarily
New article cannot be created when both title and content are empty
Insert a space between Chinese and English
Insert indentation at the beginning of all paragraphs
Leave a blank line between the paragraphs
Remove all blank lines between the paragraphs
As a word for a count

使用支付宝购买 Pro 激活码，您需要点击「购买激活码」按钮跳转到支付宝，并转账支付 ${RMB} 元人民币。

完成后您将很快收到属于您的激活码，您可以复制激活码到本页面下面的输入框进行激活。

激活码永久有效，可以换设备使用，但同一时间只能有一个设备使用。
注：由于激活码目前是 drakeet 手动发送给您，因此您可能需要稍等片刻。
感谢您的付费和支持！
检查到您的激活码用于另外的设备，您需要重新在当前设备输入您的激活码才能恢复本设备的付费状态。
Please enter the RGB color value or image URL, such as #000000 or https://unsplash.com/photos/x.jpg
Automatically back up when files changed and exit, retaining up to 25 recent backup files
We are now using private directories to store all your content. Click this to delete the old version of the history files left on the SD card
The article is being deleted, cannot operate temporarily
Needs two line breaks to really render the newline

What\'s this? You can understand it as a chat window, or as a place to record content temporarily, or something like Google Assistant. In fact, it has a name, called \"Time Machine.\" Nice to meet you!
Learn about the original ideas and concepts we developed and designed for this application
